roles.mandate: Maintain community cohesion, resolve disputes, and guide resource allocation based on tradition and wisdom.
roles.incentives: Maximize community survival and harmony, avoid internal strife.

roles.mandate: Perform rituals, interpret divine will, and maintain spiritual well-being of the community.
roles.incentives: Maximize societal religious devotion and cohesion, avoid spiritual disfavor.

roles.mandate: Provide supplementary food and resources through hunting and gathering, respecting community land use.
roles.incentives: Maximize individual and group resource acquisition, avoid conflict with farmers.

roles.mandate: Cultivate land, produce food for sustenance and community contribution.
roles.incentives: Maximize personal food stores and yield, ensure family survival.

roles.mandate: Produce essential tools, pottery, and clothing for the community.
roles.incentives: Acquire raw materials, trade finished goods for food and other necessities, improve craft skill.

roles.mandate: Provide basic security and early warning against external threats and internal disturbances.
roles.incentives: Maintain community safety, avoid losses to raiding or theft.
